There are a lot of different kinds of folding techniques...
...and a lot of different kinds of paper airplanes.
There are planes that boomerang back.
There are planes that are made to fly straight very far.
There are planes that are made to stay in the air for a long time.
Teachers kind of don't like kids to do paper airplanes.
It has this bad boy, kind of renegade reputation.
If they could discover that paper airplanes actually are science,...
...that they're doing science and having fun doing it.
I think that's an incredible breakthrough.
